00030 W.World = function(args){var self = this;
00031   // .core: position
00032   this.top = 0;
00033   this.left = 0;
00034   // .core: dimension difinition
00035   this.unit = 24;
00036   this.cols = 1;
00037   this.rows = 1;
00038   // creature default appearance position
00039   // define background if provided
00040   this.image = null;
00041   // begin dir/position
00042   this.bdir = 'south';
00043   this.brow = 0;
00044   this.bcol = 0;
00045   // status properties
00046   this.ready = true;  // ready status
00047   this.stop = false;  // stop world
00048   // containers
00049   this.creatures = [];
00050   this.matrix = [];  // creature matrix
00051 
00052   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00053   for(var i in args)
00054     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00055 
00056   // WPS components: build body & set background
00057   this.width = this.cols * this.unit;
00058   this.height = this.rows * this.unit;  // will be decided at .onload
00059   this.body = W.style('div', 'top:0px;left:0px;width:'+ (this.width + this.left)
00060     +'px;height:'+ (this.height + this.top) +'px;zIndex:1;overflow:hidden;'
00061     +'position:absolute');
00062   // expand the core to cover the background image area
00063   if(this.image)
00064     this.fitToBackground();
00065   // build core
00066   this.core = W.style('div', 'top:'+ this.top +'px;left:'+ this.left +'px;width:'
00067     + this.width +'px;height:'+ this.height +'px;zIndex:1;overflow:hidden;'
00068     +'position:absolute');
00069   this.body.appendChild(this.core);
00070 
00071   // build creature matrix
00072   this.buildMatrix = function(rows, cols){
00073     for(var i = 0; i < rows; ++i){
00074       this.matrix[i] = [];
00075       for(var j = 0; j < cols; ++j)
00076         this.matrix[i][j] = -1;
00077     }
00078   };
00079   this.buildMatrix(this.rows, this.cols);
00080 };

00082 
00090 W.World.prototype.at = function(row, col){
00091   var id = this.matrix[row][col];
00092   //window.status = 'row:'+ row +', col:'+ col;
00093   if(id == -1) return false;  // empty (default)
00094   if(id == -2) return this.wall;  // wall
00095   var creature;
00096   for(var i = 0; i < this.creatures.length; ++i){
00097     creature = this.creatures[i];
00098     if(creature.row == row && creature.col == col)
00099     return creature;
00100   }
00101   return false;
00102 };

00110 W.World.prototype.erase = function(id){
00111   var creature = this.creatures[id];
00112   this.matrix[creature.row][creature.col] = -1;
00113   this.creatures[id] = -1;
00114 };

00121 W.World.prototype.tick = function(){
00122   // @TODO: self.ready = false;
00123   for(var i = 0; i < this.creatures.length; ++i)
00124     if(this.creatures[i] != -1)
00125       this.creatures[i].action();
00126   //self.ready = true;
00127 };

00138 W.World.prototype.add = function(creature, row, col){
00139   // add .world property to the creature
00140   creature.world = this;
00141   creature.row = row?row:creature.row;
00142   creature.col = col?col:creature.col;
00143   // adjust the creature dimension
00144   if(creature.resize)
00145     creature.resize(this.unit);
00146   // adjust the creature position
00147   creature.body.style.top = (creature.row * this.unit) +'px';
00148   creature.body.style.left = (creature.col * this.unit) +'px';
00149   // notify the creature the workspace limit
00150   creature.maxTop = this.height - creature.height;
00151   creature.maxLeft = this.width - creature.width;
00152   // assign the creature id
00153   creature.id = this.creatures.length;
00154   this.creatures[this.creatures.length] = creature;
00155   // register creature
00156   this.core.appendChild(creature.body);
00157   this.matrix[creature.row][creature.col] = creature.id;
00158   return creature;
00159 };

00168 W.World.prototype.set = function(bitmask){
00169   // define wall id
00170   if(typeof this.wall == 'undefined')
00171     this.wall = {id: -2};
00172   var data = bitmask.split(':');
00173   data[1] = data[1].split(',');
00174   for(var i = 0; i < data[1].length; ++i)
00175     this.matrix[data[0]][data[1][i]] = this.wall.id;
00176 };

00184 W.World.prototype.background = function(bg){
00185   this.body.style.background = bg;
00186 };

00193 W.World.prototype.full = function(){var self = this;
00194   this.cols = Math.floor(W.width / this.unit);
00195   this.width = this.cols * this.unit;
00196   this.core.style.width = this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00197 
00198   this.rows = Math.floor(W.height / this.unit);
00199   this.height = this.rows * this.unit;
00200   this.core.style.height = this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00201 
00202   //self.body.style.height = height +'px';
00203   for(var i = 0; i < this.creatures.length; ++i){
00204     var creature = this.creatures[i];
00205     creature.maxTop = this.height - this.top - creature.height;
00206     creature.maxLeft = this.width - this.left  - creature.width;
00207   }
00208 
00209   //window.status = 'self.rows:'+ this.rows +', self.cols:'+ self.cols +', width:'+ width +', height:'+ height;
00210   this.buildMatrix(this.rows, this.cols);
00211 };

00219 W.World.prototype.showGrid = function(isOn){
00220   if(isOn){
00221     this.core.style.background =  'url('+ W.path +'module/darwin/image/grid_'+ this.unit +'.gif)';
00222   }else this.core.style.background = "";
00223 };

00231 W.World.prototype.fitToBackground = function(){var self = this;
00232   // detect image size by pre-loading
00233   var backPath = W.path + this.image;
00234   var back = new Image();
00235   back.src = backPath;
00236   // for Safari or other browsers not ensure finishing image loading as src declaration
00237   // http://dhtmlforsafari.blogspot.com/2007/06/failure-classic-method-of-image-size.html
00238   if(back.width == 0){
00239     back.onload = function(){
00240       self.body.style.width = this.width + 'px';
00241       self.body.style.height = this.height + 'px';
00242     };
00243   }
00244   this.body.style.width = back.width + 'px';
00245   this.body.style.height = back.height + 'px';
00246   this.body.style.background = 'url('+ backPath +')';
00247 };
